projects.name: BuyAndBrowse
projects.description: Created a dynamic book buying website, empowering the admin to manage content efficiently. Offered free reading with PDF upload, converted to Book flip format by admin, attracting 15% of users. Integrated Payment Gateway to the website and ensuring secure transactions enhancing security by 36%.

projects.name: Pollify
projects.description: Developed a real-time poll application allowing users to create anonymous polls instantly. Features like open voting (guest and user voting) and expiration dates, increasing user involvement by 20%. Integrated QR code, React-Share for link sharing and a pie-chart for visualizing poll results boosting poll usage by 30%.

projects.name: ToDoMate
projects.description: Created a personalized TodoList for customized task organization with unique titles and images. Integrated a visually appealing carousel slider showcasing motivational quotes, 15% boost in user productivity. Added functionality for users to add notes in various color-coded cards, enhancing the overall design aesthetic of the page.

projects.name: Emotion Based Recommender System
projects.description: Created a platform enabling over 200 users to select music, movies, and books based on their preferences. Implemented algorithms to capture and analyze user emotions with an accuracy rate of 90%. Achieved a 30% increase in user engagement by providing dynamic content suggestions through emotion-based and preference-based recommendation techniques.

experiences.description: Worked as a Frontend and Backend developer, creating a book website UI, enhancing user experience. Developed the backend for a blog with full CRUD operations for user posts, increasing engagement by 30%. Interacted and participated in web development projects, collaborating with a group of experienced developers.
